articles.title: How to enable dark mode on Facebook’s redesigned website - BGR
articles.description: Facebook officially launched its redesigned desktop website on Friday, May 8th. The new Facebook design looks much more like the mobile app, loads faster than before, removes much of the clutter of the old design, and introduces dark mode. You can opt in to t…
articles.content:
• Facebook officially launched its redesigned desktop website on Friday, May 8th.
  • The new Facebook design looks much more like the mobile app, loads faster than before, removes much of the clutter of the old design, and introduces dark mode.
